author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
This PR introduce new options for SIM configuration, which were not available in the current Geant4 used in CMSSW master but are useful for Geant4 11.1, which we plan to use in 2023. No change in any WF is expected.

private

title: Geant4 physics config for 11.1
